Name: WaterStream
Notes: An invisible water current that pushes compatible objects such as the player along a set path. The width and flow speed of the current can be adjusted.

Obj_arg3.Name: Affect By Gravity?
Obj_arg3.Description: If set, the ring's shape will be affected by gravity.

Obj_arg4.Name: Don't Push Into End?
Obj_arg4.Description: If set, objects won't be forcibly pushed into the last path point, however, they will still get pushed towards the end.

Point_arg0.Name: Flow Speed
Point_arg0.Description: The factor used to scale the flow speed. Default is 100.

Point_arg1.Name: Width Scale
Point_arg1.Description: The factor used to scale the current's width. Default is 12.

Rail.Description: The path that lays out the current's shape.

DemoSimpleCast.Description: Continues movement during cutscenes, NPC conversations, etc.
